aboutMeText1: Hello! I am Yunus, a graduate of Ege University with a degree in Computer Engineering, currently enrolled in a full-stack web development course. I am passionate about software development and strive to create user-friendly and impressive web applications by working with both frontend and backend technologies.
aboutMeText2: I am dedicated to mastering modern web technologies like React and Node.js. I enjoy developing new projects and optimizing existing ones.
